role_description: An Ansible role that installs Himalaya (a CLI email client written in Rust) on almost any platform.
role_description_full_overview: [Himalaya](https://github.com/soywod/himalaya) is a CLI email client written in Rust.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs Himalaya (a CLI email client written in Rust) on almost any platform.
